problem_names:
lemma actPres:
  fixes P :: ccs
  and   Q :: ccs
  and   \<alpha> :: act

  assumes "P \<cong> Q"

  shows "\<alpha>.(P) \<cong> \<alpha>.(Q)"

lemma sumPres:
  fixes P :: ccs
  and   Q :: ccs
  and   R :: ccs

  assumes "P \<cong> Q"

  shows "P \<oplus> R \<cong> Q \<oplus> R"

lemma parPres:
  fixes P :: ccs
  and   Q :: ccs
  and   R :: ccs

  assumes "P \<cong> Q"

  shows "P \<parallel> R \<cong> Q \<parallel> R"

lemma resPres: 
  fixes P :: ccs
  and   Q :: ccs
  and   x :: name

  assumes "P \<cong> Q"

  shows "\<lparr>\<nu>x\<rparr>P \<cong> \<lparr>\<nu>x\<rparr>Q"

lemma bangPres:
  fixes P :: ccs
  and   Q :: ccs

  assumes "P \<cong> Q"

  shows "!P \<cong> !Q"
translations:
lemma actPres:
  fixes P :: ccs
  and   Q :: ccs
  and   \<alpha> :: act

  assumes "P \<cong> Q"

  shows "\<alpha>.(P) \<cong> \<alpha>.(Q)"

proof (prove)
using this:
  P \<cong> Q

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<alpha>.P \<cong> \<alpha>.Q

proof (state)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<And>P Q.
       P \<cong> Q \<Longrightarrow>
       \<alpha>.P \<leadsto><weakBisimulation> \<alpha>.Q

proof (state)
this:
  P \<cong> Q

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<And>P Q.
       P \<cong> Q \<Longrightarrow>
       \<alpha>.P \<leadsto><weakBisimulation> \<alpha>.Q

proof (prove)
using this:
  P \<cong> Q

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. P \<approx> Q

proof (state)
this:
  P \<approx> Q

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<And>P Q.
       P \<cong> Q \<Longrightarrow>
       \<alpha>.P \<leadsto><weakBisimulation> \<alpha>.Q

proof (prove)
using this:
  P \<approx> Q

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<alpha>.P \<leadsto><weakBisimulation> \<alpha>.Q

lemma bangPres:
  fixes P :: ccs
  and   Q :: ccs

  assumes "P \<cong> Q"

  shows "!P \<cong> !Q"

proof (prove)
using this:
  P \<cong> Q

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. !P \<cong> !Q

proof (state)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<And>P Q.
       P \<cong> Q \<Longrightarrow> !P \<leadsto><weakBisimulation> !Q

proof (state)
this:
  P \<cong> Q

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<And>P Q.
       P \<cong> Q \<Longrightarrow> !P \<leadsto><weakBisimulation> !Q
let ?X = "{(P, Q) | P Q. P \<cong> Q}"

proof (state)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<And>P Q.
       P \<cong> Q \<Longrightarrow> !P \<leadsto><weakBisimulation> !Q

proof (state)
this:
  (P, Q) \<in> {(P, Q) |P Q. P \<cong> Q}

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<And>P Q.
       P \<cong> Q \<Longrightarrow> !P \<leadsto><weakBisimulation> !Q

proof (state)
this:
  (P, Q) \<in> {(P, Q) |P Q. P \<cong> Q}

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<And>P Q.
       P \<cong> Q \<Longrightarrow> !P \<leadsto><weakBisimulation> !Q

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<And>P Q.
       (P, Q) \<in> {(P, Q) |P Q. P \<cong> Q} \<Longrightarrow>
       P \<leadsto><weakBisimulation> Q

proof (state)
this:
  (?P, ?Q) \<in> {(P, Q) |P Q. P \<cong> Q} \<Longrightarrow>
  ?P \<leadsto><weakBisimulation> ?Q

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<And>P Q.
       P \<cong> Q \<Longrightarrow> !P \<leadsto><weakBisimulation> !Q

proof (state)
this:
  (?P, ?Q) \<in> {(P, Q) |P Q. P \<cong> Q} \<Longrightarrow>
  ?P \<leadsto><weakBisimulation> ?Q

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<And>P Q.
       P \<cong> Q \<Longrightarrow> !P \<leadsto><weakBisimulation> !Q

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. {(P, Q) |P Q. P \<cong> Q} \<subseteq> weakBisimulation

proof (state)
this:
  {(P, Q) |P Q. P \<cong> Q} \<subseteq> weakBisimulation

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<And>P Q.
       P \<cong> Q \<Longrightarrow> !P \<leadsto><weakBisimulation> !Q

proof (chain)
picking this:
  (P, Q) \<in> {(P, Q) |P Q. P \<cong> Q}
  (?P, ?Q) \<in> {(P, Q) |P Q. P \<cong> Q} \<Longrightarrow>
  ?P \<leadsto><weakBisimulation> ?Q
  {(P, Q) |P Q. P \<cong> Q} \<subseteq> weakBisimulation

proof (prove)
using this:
  (P, Q) \<in> {(P, Q) |P Q. P \<cong> Q}
  (?P, ?Q) \<in> {(P, Q) |P Q. P \<cong> Q} \<Longrightarrow>
  ?P \<leadsto><weakBisimulation> ?Q
  {(P, Q) |P Q. P \<cong> Q} \<subseteq> weakBisimulation

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. !P \<leadsto><bangRel weakBisimulation> !Q

proof (state)
this:
  !P \<leadsto><bangRel weakBisimulation> !Q

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<And>P Q.
       P \<cong> Q \<Longrightarrow> !P \<leadsto><weakBisimulation> !Q

proof (prove)
using this:
  !P \<leadsto><bangRel weakBisimulation> !Q

  bangRel weakBisimulation \<subseteq> weakBisimulation
